short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a burst of cuteness to your new tab with the Cute Pikachu live wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring the iconic, adorable Pikachu in a playful and joyful pose, this design brings fun and charm to your browsing experience. Quickly access your favorite websites with popular shortcuts, and personalize your tab by adding custom links. Stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock, and search the web effortlessly with your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy the playful and cute Pikachu in your new tab.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Instantly access your favorite websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with your own links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of time and dates with the built-in calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web easily with your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease via the provided links.
